name: Help your Friend
description:
Help your Friend is a short and sweet local co-op platformer made by two brothers! Avoid spikes, collect keys, and solve the colour mystery! Can you and your pal do it?

CONTROLS:

Pepito (P1):

Move with WASD.

Jorgito (P2):

Move with the arrow keys.
